item.title: About
item.description:
$ whoami

My name is Habs (habs for aesthetic purposes), short for Abdelouahab, a 3rd year Computer Science student at The Higher School of Computer Scienceâ€”Sidi Bel Abbes. (a.k.a ESI SBA)

Cyber Security

I got interested in Cyber security shortly after enrolling, and i have started digging here and there learning this and that, and now i’m trying to learn more through participating in CTFs and playing various security challenges on various websites.

This Website

This website is basically meant to be some sort of personal blog where i can document my learning progress and share whatever it is i want to share, this website was built using Hugo, along with the theme KeepIt and some slight adjustment.
I wrote two Write-ups before creating this on Medium(they’re now in the old version, you can find it easily), then i heard about this “quick” framework so i decided to give it a try.

Feedback

If you find any bugs or want to provide any sort of feedback, feel free to DM me on Discord habs#2929, or any other linked socials.
